title: Textile Sample, "Linstripe"
medium: Medium: linen (96%) and cotton (4%).  Technique: vertical bands of plain weave joined by long weft floats.
description: Vertical bands of plain weave in orange, red, violet, brown and magenta are joined together by long off-white weft floats. Bands give a stripe effect. Number 425.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile Sample, "Linstripe".
Medium: linen (96%) and cotton (4%).  Technique: vertical bands of plain weave joined by long weft floats.. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-1160.
